description: This file provides an API adapter for a notes application, including environment feature flag parsing and CRUD operations for notes via REST API endpoints.

methods.name: getEnvConfig
methods.description: Parses environment variables to produce a configuration object with feature flags, API base URL, environment, and experiment flags.

methods.name: createApiAdapter
methods.description: Factory function that creates an API client with methods to list, create, update, and delete notes, bound to a specified API base URL.
